custom-sql.sql: SELECT Newsletter_NewsletterContent.* FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContent WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND (title LIKE ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContact INNER JOIN Newsletter_NewsletterLog ON (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.contactId = Newsletter_NewsletterLog.contactId) WHERE (Newsletter_NewsletterLog.campaignId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContact INNER JOIN Newsletter_NewsletterLog ON (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.contactId = Newsletter_NewsletterLog.contactId) INNER JOIN Newsletter_NewsletterCampaign ON (Newsletter_NewsletterCampaign.campaignId = Newsletter_NewsletterLog.campaignId) WHERE (Newsletter_NewsletterCampaign.contentId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContact WHERE (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.companyId = ?) AND (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.groupId = ?) AND ( (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.email LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.name LIKE ?) )

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContact INNER JOIN Newsletter_NewsletterLog ON Newsletter_NewsletterContact.contactId = Newsletter_NewsletterLog.contactId WHERE (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.companyId = ?) AND (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.groupId = ?) AND (Newsletter_NewsletterLog.campaignId = ?) AND ( (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.email LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.name LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Newsletter_NewsletterLog.sent = ?) )
SELECT Newsletter_NewsletterContact.* FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContact WHERE (email LIKE ?)
SELECT Newsletter_NewsletterContact.* FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContact WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (email LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (name LIKE ?) )

SELECT Newsletter_NewsletterContact.* FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContact INNER JOIN Newsletter_NewsletterLog ON Newsletter_NewsletterContact.contactId = Newsletter_NewsletterLog.contactId WHERE (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.companyId = ?) AND (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.groupId = ?) AND (Newsletter_NewsletterLog.campaignId = ?) AND ( (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.email LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.name LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (Newsletter_NewsletterLog.sent = ?) )

SELECT {Newsletter_NewsletterContact.*} FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContact INNER JOIN Newsletter_NewsletterLog ON (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.contactId = Newsletter_NewsletterLog.contactId) WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND (Newsletter_NewsletterContact.name LIKE ?) AND (Newsletter_NewsletterLog.campaignId = ?) ORDER BY Newsletter_NewsletterContact.name ASC
SELECT Newsletter_NewsletterContent.* FROM Newsletter_NewsletterContent WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (title LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (content LIKE ?) )
